e86e8e40-7936-41b4-bfa9-2dc631c33537.description: Whether you’re looking to take the first step toward a career in computing or you want to develop skills from expert faculty to help you move up in your current job, Oregon State University’s online microcredential in programming fundamentals will equip you with a solid understanding of core skills that can lead to new opportunities.
e86e8e40-7936-41b4-bfa9-2dc631c33537.name: Programming Fundamentals

6f54a51d-c8fb-4440-a27a-27d7abce5aee.description: To elevate your role in your organization and prepare for an in-demand position in project management, you need to learn essential concepts, systems and techniques that are tailored to engineering professionals. And you can make it happen online in Oregon State University's graduate-level microcredential in engineering project management.
6f54a51d-c8fb-4440-a27a-27d7abce5aee.name: Engineering Project Management

d1f32a39-5992-487d-b1a5-2cda31a58d4e.description: Earning a microcredential in German online from Oregon State University will enhance your communication skills as you engage with the latest language-learning technologies, learn from native-speaking faculty and interact with students from all over the world.
d1f32a39-5992-487d-b1a5-2cda31a58d4e.name: Advanced German

db02f9ed-5879-4582-83fc-8d3ad4fbd1a8.description: Content is king, as the saying goes. And to carve out your place in the dynamic age of digital communication, you need to sharpen your skills in gathering, evaluating and writing content for digital media publication. Earning a microcredential in business of viral content creation online from Oregon State University will put you in a position to strategically analyze and produce content with the intention of building your own content platform and brand.
db02f9ed-5879-4582-83fc-8d3ad4fbd1a8.name: Business of Viral Content Creation

7ec060cf-a6f1-4b4a-9e60-9fe4451b3ff1.description: There is no shortage of data in the business world, but there is a shortage of qualified professionals who know how to leverage business analytics skills in today’s data-rich environment. Meet the growing demand for skilled workers — and learn how to apply the principles of human behavior to a variety of business contexts — by earning a microcredential in consumer analytics fundamentals online from Oregon State University.
7ec060cf-a6f1-4b4a-9e60-9fe4451b3ff1.name: Consumer Analytics Fundamentals

6a3f15e9-3e02-446d-9535-e1991913884e.description: The rapidly growing digital media field needs people with the abilities to meet consumer demands through the design, production, distribution and maintenance of high-quality content for digital media use. Gain the creativity and applied skills to visualize a text narrative into an audio/visual media production; develop core competencies in the editing and manipulation of sound media; and learn how to produce professional-quality podcasts for various digital platforms.
6a3f15e9-3e02-446d-9535-e1991913884e.name: Content Development and Production

8b368699-f811-4429-b139-d62550308336.description: People are increasingly online. For brands to reach them, it’s essential to have a strong digital marketing strategy. Digital marketing makes it easier and more cost-effective than ever for marketers to personalize, amplify and measure their message to potential customers. Learn how to rank your business in the top search results, discover the ins and out of every major digital platform, and be exposed to theories, techniques and implementation considerations in this competitive industry.
8b368699-f811-4429-b139-d62550308336.name: Digital Marketing Fundamentals

1cea31a8-390c-4ffc-837d-80bc81464e94.description: Social and economic inequality are increasingly prominent features of our lives. Be a force for good and reduce economic disparities. Professionals with an economic skill set bring a distinct collection of tools to measure, analyze and create policy on these disparities. This microcredential focuses on statistical discrimination, sources of disparities in employment and wages, the roles education and immigration play in shaping the labor market, and policies to remedy economic inequality.
1cea31a8-390c-4ffc-837d-80bc81464e94.name: Disparities and Discrimination Through an Economic Lens

375195fb-fa83-4b74-ba3e-6130a219c011.description: Economic analysis is a must-have tool for professionals in the private, public and nonprofit sectors in order to study how individuals and institutions allocate resources — and the consequences of the resource distribution. Advance your career thanks to the newly gained ability to analyze where best to focus financial and political capital, services and resources in a variety of industries.
375195fb-fa83-4b74-ba3e-6130a219c011.name: Economic Foundations

5d3f9da9-21b5-476d-a3b2-8265c65d0f7f.description: Engineering is the bedrock of your career. To add leadership abilities to your list of qualifications — and position yourself for professional growth — learn engineering-focused management skills while developing the soft skills to successfully lead teams and the credibility to influence executive decision-makers. This three-course microcredential is designed to give you an advanced understanding of engineering management principles and prepare you to thrive in managerial roles.
5d3f9da9-21b5-476d-a3b2-8265c65d0f7f.name: Engineering Management

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to Management for Engineers and Scientists (IE 582)

6d32c655-62ae-4c7c-8e43-551bf14128f9.description: Pursuing an engineering education at the university level is a wise career decision. Earning a special credential in the process that will serve you well professionally is even wiser. By enrolling in Oregon State University’s online microcredential in engineering mechanics, you’ll gain the foundational knowledge every engineering student needs. You’ll also develop the skills to adeptly work with engineering technology, complete first-line engineering tasks and more.
6d32c655-62ae-4c7c-8e43-551bf14128f9.name: Engineering Mechanics

00ab7f1a-9e9d-4fbf-bc27-0894ba8321eb.description: The world is changing faster than ever, and our economy needs creative leaders who can readily identify new ventures and remain agile through complex and uncertain times. Learn design-thinking principles that will help you quickly identify and scale emerging business opportunities. This microcredential gives you an overview of the basic principles of entrepreneurship, common mistakes and pitfalls as well as a framework for process innovation.
00ab7f1a-9e9d-4fbf-bc27-0894ba8321eb.name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship: Opportunity Identification

c2af9fa5-2c14-494a-942f-77110ba5d951.description: Earning a microcredential in German online from Oregon State University will enhance your communication skills as you engage with the latest language-learning technologies, learn from native-speaking faculty and interact with students from all over the world.
c2af9fa5-2c14-494a-942f-77110ba5d951.name: Intermediate German I

a98112a4-99a3-4de4-9249-a60e570b4e3d.description: Earning a microcredential in German online from Oregon State University will enhance your communication skills as you engage with the latest language-learning technologies, learn from native-speaking faculty and interact with students from all over the world.
a98112a4-99a3-4de4-9249-a60e570b4e3d.name: Intermediate German II

2fa7c7e3-ed5b-4460-b37b-ac6ad7d7ebc4.description: Korean is spoken by over 80 million people worldwide. Oregon State University offers online microcredentials in both introductory and intermediate Korean, so you can gain the language skills you need to engage more respectfully in global business and travel. With these courses, you’ll learn the logical components of Korean, with a focus on reading, writing, listening, speaking, colloquial expressions and cultural exploration — giving you a comprehensive understanding of this unique language.
2fa7c7e3-ed5b-4460-b37b-ac6ad7d7ebc4.name: Intermediate Korean

3a139c47-ef95-4cab-a220-264419c7afe7.description: Level up your Spanish skills with a focus on writing, speaking and expression, and learn how to leverage comprehension strategies that will help you further your ability to communicate in Spanish. This 12-credit microcredential will equip you with the competency to engage in conversations in Spanish with increased confidence and help you understand and interpret spoken and written Spanish in a variety of topics.
3a139c47-ef95-4cab-a220-264419c7afe7.name: Intermediate Spanish

b9671f27-37a5-49d4-a7aa-d8d4247ce666.description: Learn basic conversational Chinese and build a strong foundation that will enable you to communicate with a global network. More than one billion people speak Mandarin Chinese, and as a student in this microcredential, you’ll learn the essentials of colloquial Mandarin with an emphasis on conversation, reading and writing. This 12-credit, online offering is designed for students with no prior education in the Chinese language.
b9671f27-37a5-49d4-a7aa-d8d4247ce666.name: Introductory Chinese

0b4e8a99-90f7-4057-8baa-4732383eed62.description: Earning a microcredential in German online from Oregon State University will enhance your communication skills as you engage with the latest language-learning technologies, learn from native-speaking faculty and interact with students from all over the world.
0b4e8a99-90f7-4057-8baa-4732383eed62.name: Introductory German

5a78f677-f859-4728-96f8-88ac421d078b.description: Korean is spoken by over 80 million people worldwide. Oregon State University offers online microcredentials in both introductory and intermediate Korean, so you can gain the language skills you need to engage more respectfully in global business and travel. With these courses, you’ll learn the logical components of Korean, with a focus on reading, writing, listening, speaking, colloquial expressions and cultural exploration — giving you a comprehensive understanding of this unique language.
5a78f677-f859-4728-96f8-88ac421d078b.name: Introductory Korean

0a0fbb4a-8f4e-4268-a72b-18dba6904686.description: If you've never taken a Spanish class before — or if you have some experience but want to build your confidence before moving to the next level — this 12-credit microcredential will help you gain the language skills and proficiency you need. Learn about the complexity of the Spanish language and the diversity of Spanish-speaking communities as you hone your abilities to engage in conversation, provide and gather information, and interpret spoken and written Spanish on a variety of topics.
0a0fbb4a-8f4e-4268-a72b-18dba6904686.name: Introductory Spanish

cc7ca781-551a-451b-af36-a3839e812ec5.description: Help remove language barriers in medicine. Spanish is spoken by over 500 million people globally, and its widespread use — in the United States and around the world — is only expected to grow. With this microcredential, you’ll deepen your listening comprehension, speaking, reading and writing skills, with a focus on health care and medical language. You’ll also explore human health and healing systems from evolutionary and cross-cultural perspectives.
cc7ca781-551a-451b-af36-a3839e812ec5.name: Medical Spanish

fd9c1969-c90d-4099-a6e0-5342ba90e2dc.description: Learn how to control hazards that come about from the products, processes, and services today's organizations provide. Encompassing public health policy, operations and supply chain management, and industrial engineering, this microcredential is designed to help supply chain specialists manage exposures to hazards that affect workers. Most importantly, it aims to effectively deal with one of the most fundamental indicators of a facility’s social performance: the health and safety of its workers.
fd9c1969-c90d-4099-a6e0-5342ba90e2dc.name: Occupational Safety in Supply Chain Management

badge_template_activities.title: Occupational Safety & Health, Standards and Law

46fc663a-dea6-406c-9059-fb1a5629e8e9.description: Develop the skills that businesses need most so you can help motivate people and teams to achieve greater success. This 12-credit microcredential, offered online by Oregon State's renowned College of Business, will equip you with the competency to understand employee thoughts, emotions and behaviors; explore effective leadership styles that best fit your personality and preferences; and develop leadership in the capacity of mentoring and cross-culture communication.
46fc663a-dea6-406c-9059-fb1a5629e8e9.name: Organizational Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Managing Organizations (BA 351) or Managing Individual and Team Performance (BA352)
Introduction to Mentoring and Coaching (MGMT 450) or Cross-cultural Management (MGMT 446)

f0f2ec0a-cef0-4ef9-8f3b-83a102c7fced.description: To be successful in today’s competitive job market, you first need to learn how to be a skilled problem-solver, communicator and leader — someone who can make sound financial decisions in business and all aspects of your life. The professional readiness microcredential is a subset of the OSU College of Business' award-winning education-to-career curriculum model, Blueprint, which aims to facilitate students' professional and leadership development and financial literacy.
f0f2ec0a-cef0-4ef9-8f3b-83a102c7fced.name: Professional Readiness

3d1856bb-3e87-43d8-8ad2-9878fdf94503.description: People today are inundated with information and options. It’s no longer enough to have a great idea, product or service. To succeed, you need a creative sales approach that will help your offering stand out as the clear and obvious choice. Learn the concepts and principles behind effective sales strategies and become skilled in identifying opportunities, persuasive communication and personal selling techniques.
3d1856bb-3e87-43d8-8ad2-9878fdf94503.name: Professional Sales

62ebf16e-8d1c-4bc5-b40a-7aaf6d8c8fcf.description: Make an impact on our changing world. From health and the environment to housing and agriculture, all aspects of our lives are shaped by policy. Now, more than ever, we need critical thinkers who can help enact positive change in a rapidly evolving social and economic landscape. Learn how to conduct research, analyze and interpret qualitative data, and present this data to inform decision-making and new policies.
62ebf16e-8d1c-4bc5-b40a-7aaf6d8c8fcf.name: Public Policy Foundations

468a55cd-bcf9-410a-87d1-a70b114f82f7.description: Whether you’re interested in the environment, housing, energy or another sector entirely, creating meaningful change takes a deep understanding of the theories and frameworks that shape policy and strong leadership skills. Gain a historical overview of the theories that shape public organizations, including various influential models of bureaucracy. You’ll learn how to effectively identify key issues, analyze their effects from various angles and be able to apply an equity lens to your work.
468a55cd-bcf9-410a-87d1-a70b114f82f7.name: Public Policy Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Public Policy through the Lens of Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (PPOL 554)

99cae8ef-8bbc-44e2-9a23-0496feba952a.description: The world of retail is evolving as consumer behaviors continue to change. To stay on top of industry trends and acquire knowledge that will serve you well throughout your career, earn this microcredential online with OSU. Learn about all levels of management responsibility related to merchandising and store operations; gain abilities to effectively market brands, products and services; and develop interpersonal skills that you’ll need to become an effective team member and leader.
99cae8ef-8bbc-44e2-9a23-0496feba952a.name: Retail Management Fundamentals

1553346c-e1c4-4527-b951-4c706bdc83a6.description: Sports are more than just a game. The global sports business industry is a rapidly evolving area of work. And this booming field needs professionals who can manage growth opportunities and cultivate innovative, data-driven strategies to advance the industry. Gain the skills to develop marketing strategies in sport, critically evaluate strategic implications of sponsorship, interpret financial practices, and apply analytical skills to improve sports business decision-making.
1553346c-e1c4-4527-b951-4c706bdc83a6.name: Sports Business

dfbd779e-97ad-4f13-a14c-5e35c499ad08.description: Learn how to blend practical analysis skills with your newly acquired knowledge of supply chain management — and fine-tune your interpersonal and innovation skills through experiential learning opportunities — when you earn this microcredential online from Oregon State University. Gaining these abilities will help you stand out in the job market as a professional who can help design and improve global supply chain processes and manage supply chain sustainability and resiliency.
dfbd779e-97ad-4f13-a14c-5e35c499ad08.name: Supply Chain Logistics Management and Procurement

3490336d-aa3c-4bf6-a869-09a46b94c0ab.description: The global supply chain is an integral part of life as we know it, and it will remain that way far into the future. Take advantage of the opportunity to gain foundational knowledge and analytical skills that will help you positively impact critical functions of supply operations. You’ll develop decision-making skills related to project and inventory management as well as the ability to apply process management concepts and tools — including Total Quality Management and Six Sigma.
3490336d-aa3c-4bf6-a869-09a46b94c0ab.name: Supply Chain Management Fundamentals
